name: @qius.solutions/qiusflex
description: QiusFlex - CSS utilities powered by Qius Solutions

scripts.build-lib: sass --update _sass/lib/qiusflex.scss:dist/qiusflex.css --no-source-map --style expanded && sass --update _sass/lib/qiusflex.scss:dist/qiusflex.min.css --no-source-map --style compressed && sass --update _sass/lib/themes:dist/themes && gulp generate-lib && gulp generate-readme && gulp generate-package-json

author: Qius Solutions <qius.solutions@gmail.com>
